description: A set of two rings on top of a single large platform, accomodating a single 1-in. scope.

notes: length is calculated as 3.05 (space between rings) + 0.75 (length of ring) × 2 + 0.375 (half of ring length before back ring) in
height is assumed to be 1.2× center height
width is assumed to be Picatinny rail width × 1.5, accounting for the ring width
